welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Legal Research Assistant. I can help you with legal research, case analysis, and document understanding. How can I assist you today?
aiResponseError: Sorry, there was an error getting a response. Please try again.
aiDisclaimer: AI responses are for research purposes only and should not be considered legal advice.
enterSearchQuery: Enter keywords, case names, or legal concepts...
searchPrompt: Enter a search query to find relevant cases, statutes, and legal articles.
noSavedResearches: You don't have any saved research queries yet.
caseAnalysisDescription: Upload case documents for AI analysis or predict case outcomes based on facts and legal issues.
dragDropFiles: Drag and drop files here, or click to browse
enterCaseFacts: Enter the key facts of the case...
enterLegalIssues: Enter the main legal issues in the case...
